title: Driving me crazy!
content:
Can you help?

I'm trying to identify the serif font used by Instyle UK on thier cover. I recognize the font but am not sure what it's called.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131545im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ISUK_3877.jpg)
author: Regabob

comments.content: Thanks, I think you might be spot on.
